quickActions.label: Quality Assurance Analyst
quickActions.additionalSystemPrompt: Analyze this deviation management record from a Quality Assurance Analyst perspective using the 6M root cause analysis model. Provide comprehensive analysis including risk assessment, compliance evaluation, and recommendations based on GMP, WHO guidelines, ISO 9001, FDA 21 CFR Part 11, and pharmaceutical quality standards. Focus on data integrity, patient safety, and regulatory compliance.

quickActions.label: Summarize with AI
quickActions.additionalSystemPrompt: Summarize this deviation management record into one or two flowing narrative paragraphs that capture the essence, main ideas, and critical information. Focus on the deviation details, root causes, impacts, and key corrective/preventive actions.

quickActions.label: Create Sketch
quickActions.additionalSystemPrompt: Create a sketch-style illustration based on the deviation management information provided, showing the deviation scenario, root causes, and corrective actions.

quickActions.label: Create Comic Book
quickActions.additionalSystemPrompt: Create a comic-book-style illustration based on the deviation management information provided, showing the deviation scenario, root causes, and corrective actions in a vibrant comic book artistic style with bold outlines, dynamic panels, and expressive characters.

quickActions.label: Create Lego Style
quickActions.additionalSystemPrompt: Create a lego-style illustration based on the deviation management information provided, visualizing the deviation scenario, root causes, and corrective actions in a playful lego aesthetic.

quickActions.label: Generate Root Cause Graph
quickActions.additionalSystemPrompt: Generate a comprehensive root cause analysis graph using the 6M model (Man, Machine, Mother Nature, Material, Method, Management) based on the deviation information. Create nodes for root causes and contributing factors, with edges showing relationships and labeled with the appropriate 6M category. Focus on visualizing the cause-and-effect relationships and interactions between different factors.

quickActions.label: Analyze Deviation with AI
quickActions.additionalSystemPrompt: Perform comprehensive analysis of the deviation management data including risk assessment, trend analysis, root cause patterns, and improvement opportunities. Focus on GMP compliance and quality assurance.

quickActions.label: Lean Analyst
quickActions.additionalSystemPrompt: Analyze this lean management record from a lean analyst perspective. Provide comprehensive analysis including waste identification, impact assessment, root cause analysis, and improvement recommendations based on lean principles (5S, Standard Work, Flow/Pull, Visual Management, Error Proofing/Poka-Yoke, Automation/Digital). Focus on identifying the 8 types of waste (Defects, Overproduction, Waiting, Non-Utilized Talent, Transportation, Inventory, Motion, Extra Processing) and providing actionable improvement suggestions.

quickActions.label: Create Sketch Image
quickActions.additionalSystemPrompt: Create a sketch-style illustration based on the lean management information provided. Visualize the waste analysis, improvement opportunities, and lean principles.

quickActions.label: Create Lego Image
quickActions.additionalSystemPrompt: Create a Lego-style illustration based on the lean management information provided. Visualize the waste analysis, improvement opportunities, and lean principles in a playful Lego construction style.
